newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - West Virginia Housing.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - West Virginia Housing.

text.p: SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the West Virginia Housing Development Fund (the Housing Development Fund'') at the Offices of Hawkins, Delafield & Wood (Reception Area
- 12th Floor), 67 Wall Street, New York, New York, until 11:00 A.M. Eastern Standard Time on
for the purchase of the Housing Development Fund'
$50,000,000 Housing Finance Bonds, 1997 Series A and 1997 Series B, dated January 1, 1997 (the

are offered for sale pursuant to the Official Notice of Sale, dated January 15, 1997, of the Housing Development Fund (the Official Notice of Sale''). Copies of the Official Notice of Sale and the required Form of Proposal and of the Proposed Official Statement of the Housing Development Fund relating to the Bonds may be obtained from the undersigned at 814 Virginia Street East, Charleston, West Virginia 25301 (Tel. 304-345-6475) or from the Financial Advisor - Marquette de Bary Co., Inc., 477
Madison Avenue, New York, New York 10022 (Attn: Paul de Bary, Tel. 212-644-5300).
